ENTRY.refkeywords: xslsmooth lsmooth load_lsmooth lorentzian smooth smoothing variable width sigma index sig@6kev sigat6kev x-spec xspec convolution model experimental

DESC.PARA: Lorentzian smoothing with a variable width, which varies as the Index power of the energy. The width at 6 keV is set with the SigAt6keV parameter.

ROW.DATA: The sigma for the lorentzian at 6 keV (in keV)
Power of energy for sigma variation

DESC.PARA: Please see ahelp xsconvolve for information on how to load the model.

LIST.CAPTION: Notes
LIST.ITEM: This is an experimental release of the convolution models; please take care when using this model.

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.10.0e of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.11.
The powerlaw is convolved by a lorentzian whose sigma varies as Energy^1.5 and is 0.5 keV at 6 keV.
